column3: yeshiva birchas chaim is a orthodox jewish mesivta high school in lakewood township new jersey.it was founded by rabbi shmuel zalmen stein in 2001 after his father rabbi chaim stein asked him to open a branch of telshe yeshiva in lakewood. as of the 2009-10 school year the school had an enrollment of 76 students and 6.6 classroom teachers(on a fte basis) for a studentâ€“teacher ratio of 11.51.
